text: Chilli Qhata (Aymara chilli deep, qhata knee pit, (see: Hondo de la tierra y agua. "deep knee pit", also spelled Chillicata) is a mountain in the Andes of Bolivia. It is situated in the Oruro Department, Sajama Province, at the border of the Curahuara de Carangas Municipality and the Turco Municipality. Chilli Qhata lies south-west of the mountain Q'aysiri and east of Janq'u Jaqhi. == References == Category:Mountains of Oruro Department
title: Chilli Qhata
